text_block_list.text:
It's time for Nature and Machitan's 
"Paka Paka TV Shopping"!
text_block_list.name: Matikane Tannhäuser

text_block_list.text:
An unknown TV program has started 
in front of me. Starting observation.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
Today's item is: Me...! 
——To give special cooking service!
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text:
From stews to cabbage rolls, 
I'll help you out in the kitchen! 
<size=30>Especially with the appliances.</size>
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text:
This service is perfect for those who 
struggle with kitchen appliances!
text_block_list.name: Matikane Tannhäuser

text_block_list.text:
Target audience detected. 
Result (98% certainty): Me.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
However, similar services are highly 
costly. Won't this be very expensive?
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
W-We have a special offer! The service 
comes at a discounted price for those 
with a birthday today: Entirely free!
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text:
Observation complete. 
Response: Gratitude for this wonderful 
birthday present.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
But wait, there's more! Call now and 
Machitan teaches you how to make 
a yummy potato salad!
text_block_list.name: Matikane Tannhäuser

text_block_list.text:
That's a large bonus! I'm looking 
forward to expanding my culinary 
technology tree.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
